title: I read a story in your newspaper a few months ago about a movie theater coming to the vacant lot next to Home Depot in Monkey Junction in 2012.  I haven\'t seen any construction, are they still planning on building the theaters?
text:
The
story says the theater isn't scheduled to open until next summer.
Here's a link to the story:
http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20110718/ARTICLES/110719685?p=1&tc=pg
